title: What do you guys max first on Fizz?

replies.body:
E for getting CS under your tower and clearing for roams while keeping damage and utility
Q for getting the quickest burst
W for stronger on-hit damage, good against other melee targets

Just max E first or second, the CD on it goes down by level making it so valuable to level early.

Loads of people are saying e, but imo Q works really well in lots of situations. I used to max E until a friend who mains Fizz got me to try Q...

It works great for q'ing enemies in lane and e'ing away from them for poke. Loads of damage and you still have an reliable escape in all situations, unlike initiating with e...

I think it probably comes down to play style and personal preference, though. Just try both over a number of games and see what works best for you.

E.
It clears waves much faster, it's better for teamfights and it has the highest burst damage early on.
W is a good choice as well, but I always max it after E, because farming and teamfights are both more important to me than ensuring to get that one kill with the better single target damage.

E would be for wave clearing, so you can roam more.
W would be if your enemy cant wave clear at all and you can get in their faces and just repeat kill them.
Q would be for initial bursting and wanting to kill but dont need E wave clear.

overall fizz is REALLY versatile. leveling any skill is going to be a good choice. since they all offer about the same in terms of increasing damage. hell, QWEQWREQWERQWEQRWE might even be a viable skill order...not maxing anything until lvl 15 lel.
Q vs lissandra E every other champ

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=MXsLowUI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-25T03:56:05.003+0000)
>
> Q vs lissandra E every other champ

Is that because Lissandra's abilities are very hard to dodge? Or....

> [{quoted}](name=FilAmOzNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=MXsLowUI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-25T04:42:21.493+0000)
>
> Is that because Lissandra's abilities are very hard to dodge? Or....

its for the burst on q I just find it works better cause she can use her ult when u e but not when u q
I max Q first. When you get your Lichbane and DFG you will nuke everyone.
w is best, then e, then q
Depends if you are laning against a ranges or melee champ. W for melee, E for ranged. But im not a good fizz player, so take that with a grain of salt
